title: EarnOnVictor
author: EarnOnVictor
content: Hi guys! Today is the much-anticipated election in our dear country. The result of this election will determine how the country will be run in the next 4 years. So help us God!Regardless of your preferences and who wins, I created this thread since we can't be everywhere at the same time, our members' eyes could still be our guide in their various domains.Please, update how the situation is in your area, is it calm and fair, are they buying and selling votes, a BVAS issue, a security operatives' professionalism and bias etc?You can update us about anything as it unfolds, Thanks!#Edit:Sorry guys, I mistakingly skipped an already posted similar thread but this can't be undone anymore. Please, make your choice.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441147.0

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: For my area presently,no INEC officials don come,I no come know wetin dey delay them. This na the first time wey I dey witness this thing,say when INEC officials never come people no go come out to their polling units,until them see INEC officials before them go come out. This shows that they don't want to over stress themselves because them no say last last them most vote. For where I dey stay before,this kind time INEC officials don dey ground dey coordinate things and even if INEC never come, voters go don full their PU dey wait for INEC.I go still update una later as e go for this side. Vote wisely and make a difference.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Merit.s on February 25, 2023, 08:34:33 AMFor my area presently,no INEC officials don come,I no come know wetin dey delay them. This na the first time wey I dey witness this thing,say when INEC officials never come people no go come out to their polling units,until them see INEC officials before them go come out. This shows that they don't want to over stress themselves because them no say last last them most vote. For where I dey stay before,this kind time INEC officials don dey ground dey coordinate things and even if INEC never come, voters go don full their PU dey wait for INEC.I go still update una later as e go for this side. Vote wisely and make a difference.My broda no be small thing for my area too.Â  They had to cancel all the polin unit for ma area (47units). The inec officials came very late about around 1pm and after getting there the materials needed for processing the electoral process were still missing or i would say not complete. My own pollin unit had about 750 register voters but only 150 votiing papers were brought present which led to serious complains from voters who came very early to cast their voters but waited all day long and still didnt got the opportunity to do so.
